content: happiness is autumn and knitting season--where crisp mornings mean you absolutely need a cowl fall also brings thoughts of patterned textiles--of plaids and stripes and houndstooth this cowl is an homage to our favorite autumnal plaids utilizing a variation of barbara walker s mosaic instant plaid and worked in an unexpected and ultra-soft yarn samples shown dimond laine birdie dk in colors frog rock mc waverly cc and plaid is my favorite color ac and in colors coorie mc shell cc and plaid is my favorite color ac sizes one size finished measurements approx 31 /79 cm circumference at bottom and 23 /58cm circumference at top by 17 /43 cm tall after blocking yarn requirements *please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make * dimond laine birdie dk 90% alpaca 10 silk 246 yards per 100 grams 3 skeins total 1 each in three colors or dk- to worsted-weight yarns in the following amounts total 290 yards/265 m mc 145 yards/132 m cc 115 yards/105 m ac 30 yards/27 m needles *needles listed are suggested * gauge needle us 7 4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circular needle optional 16 /40 cm circular needle in gauge size tools bor marker darning needle gauge approx 15 sts and 26 rounds = 4 /10 cm in slip_stitch plaid pattern using gauge needle blocked
